description:
Defendants convicted

Explanatory notes for the following statistics:
24311 Criminal prosecution statistics

Definition:
Defendants convicted are persons who have committed an
offence and against whom an imprisonment, personal arrest
and/or fine has been imposed or whose offence has been
punished by youth custody and/or measures in accordance with
juvenile criminal law. Measures as defined in the Youth
Courts Law are disciplinary measures and supervisory
measures; they may be ordered in combination.
